verses.verse: I commend<WG4921> to you our sister<WG79> Phoebe,<WG5402> who is a servant<WG1249> of the church<WG1577> which is at Cenchrea;<WG2747>

that you receive<WG4327> her in the Lord<WG2962> in a manner<WG516> worthy<WG516> of the saints,<WG40> and that you help<WG3936> her in whatever<WG3739> <WG302> matter<WG4229> she may have<WG5535> need<WG5535> of you; for she herself<WG846> has also<WG2532> been<WG1096> a helper<WG4368> of many,<WG4183> and of myself<WG1473> as well.<WG846>
Greet<WG782> Prisca<WG4251> and Aquila,<WG207> my fellow<WG4904> workers<WG4904> in Christ<WG5547> Jesus,<WG2424>

who<WG3748> for my life<WG5590> risked<WG5294> their own<WG1438> necks,<WG5137> to whom<WG3739> not only<WG3441> do I give<WG2168> thanks,<WG2168> but also<WG2532> all<WG3956> the churches<WG1577> of the Gentiles;<WG1484>

also<WG2532> [greet<WG782>] the church<WG1577> that is in their house.<WG3624> Greet Epaenetus,<WG1866> my beloved,<WG27> who<WG3739> is the first<WG536> convert<WG536> to Christ<WG5547> from Asia.<WG773>
Greet<WG782> Mary,<WG3137> who<WG3748> has worked<WG2872> hard<WG4183> for you.

Greet<WG782> Andronicus<WG408> and Junias,<WG2458> my kinsmen,<WG4773> and my fellow<WG4869> prisoners,<WG4869> who<WG3748> are outstanding<WG1978> among<WG1722> the apostles,<WG652> who<WG3739> also<WG2532> were in Christ<WG5547> before<WG4253> me.
Greet<WG782> Ampliatus,<WG291> my beloved<WG27> in the Lord.<WG2962>
Greet<WG782> Urbanus,<WG3773> our fellow<WG4904> worker<WG4904> in Christ,<WG5547> and Stachys<WG4720> my beloved.<WG27>
Greet<WG782> Apelles,<WG559> the approved<WG1384> in Christ.<WG5547> Greet<WG782> those<WG3588> who<WG3588> are of the [household] of Aristobulus.<WG711>
Greet<WG782> Herodion,<WG2267> my kinsman.<WG4773> Greet<WG782> those<WG3588> of the [household] of Narcissus,<WG3488> who are in the Lord.<WG2962>

Greet<WG782> Tryphaena<WG5170> and Tryphosa,<WG5173> workers<WG2872> in the Lord.<WG2962> Greet<WG782> Persis<WG4069> the beloved,<WG27> who<WG3748> has worked<WG2872> hard<WG4183> in the Lord.<WG2962>
Greet<WG782> Rufus,<WG4504> a choice<WG1588> man<WG1588> in the Lord,<WG2962> also<WG2532> his mother<WG3384> and mine.<WG1699>
Greet<WG782> Asyncritus,<WG799> Phlegon,<WG5393> Hermes,<WG2060> Patrobas,<WG3969> Hermas<WG2057> and the brethren<WG80> with them.
Greet<WG782> Philologus<WG5378> and Julia,<WG2456> Nereus<WG3517> and his sister,<WG79> and Olympas,<WG3652> and all<WG3956> the saints<WG40> who are with them.
Greet<WG782> one<WG240> another<WG240> with a holy<WG40> kiss.<WG5370> All<WG3956> the churches<WG1577> of Christ<WG5547> greet<WG782> you.

Now<WG1161> I urge<WG3870> you, brethren,<WG80> keep<WG4648> your eye<WG4648> on those<WG3588> who cause<WG4160> dissensions<WG1370> and hindrances<WG4625> contrary<WG3844> to the teaching<WG1322> which<WG3739> you learned,<WG3129> and turn<WG1578> away<WG1578> from them.

For such<WG5108> men<WG5108> are slaves,<WG1398> not of our Lord<WG2962> Christ<WG5547> but of their own<WG1438> appetites;<WG2836> and by their smooth<WG5542> and flattering<WG2129> speech<WG2129> they deceive<WG1818> the hearts<WG2588> of the unsuspecting.<WG172>

For the report of your obedience<WG5218> has reached<WG864> to all;<WG3956> therefore<WG3767> I am rejoicing<WG5463> over<WG1909> you, but I want<WG2309> you to be wise<WG4680> in what<WG18> is good,<WG18> and innocent<WG185> in what<WG2556> is evil.<WG2556>
And the God<WG2316> of peace<WG1515> will soon<WG5034> crush<WG4937> Satan<WG4567> under<WG5259> your feet.<WG4228> The grace<WG5485> of our Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> be with you.
Timothy<WG5095> my fellow<WG4904> worker<WG4904> greets<WG782> you, and [so do] Lucius<WG3066> and Jason<WG2394> and Sosipater,<WG4989> my kinsmen.<WG4773>
I, Tertius,<WG5060> who write<WG1125> this<WG3588> letter,<WG1992> greet<WG782> you in the Lord.<WG2962>

Gaius,<WG1050> host<WG3581> to me and to the whole<WG3650> church,<WG1577> greets<WG782> you. Erastus,<WG2037> the city<WG4172> treasurer<WG3623> greets<WG782> you, and Quartus,<WG2890> the brother.<WG80>
[The grace<WG5485> of our Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> be with you all.<WG3956> Amen.<WG281>]

Now<WG1161> to Him who is able<WG1410> to establish<WG4741> you according<WG2596> to my gospel<WG2098> and the preaching<WG2782> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> according<WG2596> to the revelation<WG602> of the mystery<WG3466> which has been kept<WG4601> secret<WG4601> for long<WG5550> ages<WG5550> past,

but now<WG3568> is manifested,<WG5319> and by the Scriptures<WG1124> of the prophets,<WG4397> according<WG2596> to the commandment<WG2003> of the eternal<WG166> God,<WG2316> has been made<WG1107> known<WG1107> to all<WG3956> the nations,<WG1484> [leading] to obedience<WG5218> of faith;<WG4102>
to the only<WG3441> wise<WG4680> God,<WG2316> through<WG1223> Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> be the glory<WG1391> forever.<WG165> Amen.<WG281>
